name: market for generic C4 hydrocarbons | generic C4 hydrocarbons | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/29595/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This markets contains hydrocarbons with four C atoms for chemical synthesis and fuel application.;This is the market for 'C4 hydrocarbons' in the the Global geography. This is a generic market; the suppliers of this market make available this generic product by redirecting a part of the production of several more specific products.;No transport or losses have been considered for the generic product supplied in this market, as the transport modelled in the upstream niche markets for the more specific products do already account it.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'generic C4 hydrocarbons',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'generic C4 hydrocarbons', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: C:Manufacturing/19:Manufacture of coke and refined petroleum products/192:Manufacture of refined petroleum products/1920:Manufacture of refined petroleum products
